node.name: indirect_ptc_fast
node.label: indirect_ptc_fast
node.author: DRL
node.help: Optimized version of point-based indirect illumination (or blurry reflections). Allows to execute much faster computations for Nth trace depth.

property.name: Ns
property.help: Shading normal. It has to be normalized (of 1 unit length) and should be faceforwarded. You really want to plug ShadingNormal node here. Or normalized reflection vector (converted to normal).

property.name: rayDepth
property.help: Traced depth of the current ray. Connect rayDepth node to this input.

property.name: ConeAngle
property.help: The sampled cone is defined by vector +- ConeAngle measured in degrees. Therefore, angle of sampled cone = ConeAngle * 2!!! 90 = entire hemisphere.

property.name: SampleBase
property.help: Specifies the (float) jittering of the hemisphere ray origins. A value of 1 corresponds to jittering over the size of a micropolygon. This is useful to smooth out aliased occlusion next to edges. Default is 1.

property.name: MaxDist
property.help: Only consider intersections closer than this distance. Default is 1e38.

property.name: FalloffMode
property.help: Falloff curve to use. 0 is exponential (default) and 1 is polynomial.

property.name: MaxSolidAngle
property.help: Quality vs speed control. The lower, the better, but slower. For final render should be below 0.05. Default is 0.1.

property.name: SortBleeding
property.help: If 1, and clamp is also 1, color bleeding computations take the ordering of surfaces into account. It is recommanded to set this parameter to 1. Default is 0.

property.name: CoordSys
property.help: Coordinate system in which ptc-file was baked.

property.name: rayDepthMax
property.help: Maximum traced depth of the ray, at which color bleeding will be calculated. For higher trace depth simplified indirectdiffuse is performed. 0 - direct visibility, 1 - reflections of the 1st level. Default is 1.

property.name: ptcFile_simple
property.help: Simplified point-cloud file, which is used for trace depths higher than rayDepthMax. If you set absolutely empty point-cloud file here, the simpliest comptation will be performed: it will only make an envMap lookup.

property.name: MaxSolidAngle_simple
property.help: Quality setting used for trace depths higher than rayDepthMax. You can set higher value here to gain some render speed without making picture significantly worse.
